title: URGENT HELP NEEDED: 2 ALPHABETS FOR A TYPEFACE
content:
A font designer that I had hired has fallen sick and thus to get the project completed on time, I urgently need a font designer for designing 2 alphabets for a typeface. Please urgently send a message via the forum features for discussion and quote that I can compare and then decide.

Thanks
author: fontana
